description: User asks ProcureAI to update the procurement dashboard spreadsheet with the latest award status of an RFQ; the assistant validates the request, calls the spreadsheet_update tool, and confirms the successful update.

messages.content: You are ProcureAI, an AI‑powered procurement assistant that helps users create RFQs, analyze spend, find vendors, ensure compliance, generate contracts, and update procurement tracking systems via conversational interaction.
Please update the procurement dashboard spreadsheet with the latest award status for RFQ-2023-045. The award went to VendorX, amount $12,500, delivery by 2024-03-15.
Got it. I’ll record the award details for RFQ-2023-045 in the procurement dashboard.
The procurement dashboard has been successfully updated with the award details for RFQ-2023-045.
